colorblindcheck 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Title

palette_dist.Rd

Title

palette_dist(x, cvd = NULL, metric = 1976, ...)

Arguments

x
cvd
metric

a vector of color metric specifiers. Valid values are '1976','1994', and '2000', which refer to the year the metric was recommended by the CIE.
...

Examples

x = rcartocolor::carto_pal(11, "Vivid")
palette_dist(x)
#>       [,1]     [,2]     [,3]      [,4]      [,5]     [,6]      [,7]      [,8]
